scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.dev: ln -sf config-emulator.ts packages/frontend/src/config.ts && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --project demo-project --import packages/backend/testdata --export-on-exit
scripts.deploy-live: ln -sf config-live.ts packages/frontend/src/config.ts && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-staging: ln -sf config-staging.ts packages/frontend/src/config.ts && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-test: ln -sf config-test.ts packages/frontend/src/config.ts && npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy test
